page.title: 11A day with the Taylor family
page.content: heard a story and wrote. A. drew 2 pictures, had physical education, wrote and read. At lunchtime, G. had sandwiches at the building site. L. brought the girls from school at 11.55, giving them ham sandwiches with wheatgerm bread and yoghurt. She took the girls back to school 13.05. In the afternoon, G. did more glazing and some roof insulation from 13.05 until 19.30 with short tea breaks at 15.05 and 18.05. L. spent the afternoon ironing and collected a prescription from the chemist for Grandma. At school, J. finished writing and had assembly. At break she played "Kiss Catch". A. played with Lego bricks, read, and did capacity work (filling a bucket with bottles) before assembly (cont)
